uk.ac.ebi.pride.utilities.data.controller.access
Interface PeptideDataAccess

All Known Subinterfaces:
DataAccessController
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataAccessController, CachedDataAccessController, MzDataControllerImpl, MzIdentMLControllerImpl, MzMLControllerImpl, MzTabControllerImpl, MzXmlControllerImpl, PeakControllerImpl, PRIDEWebServiceDataAccessController, PrideXmlControllerImpl, ReferencedIdentificationController
public interface PeptideDataAccess

PeptideDataAccess defines methods for accessing peptide related information.

You may find the concept of peptide id alien to PRIDE XML files, the index of peptide in the identification should be used in this case.

Author:
ypriverol, rwang

getPeptidePrecursorCharge

java.lang.Integer getPeptidePrecursorCharge(java.lang.Comparable identId,
                                            java.lang.Comparable peptideId)
Get precursor charge on peptide level Note: sometimes, precursor charge at the peptide level is different from the precursor charge at the spectrum level As the peptide-level precursor charge is often assigned by search engine rather than ms instrument

Parameters:
identId - identification id
peptideId - peptid eid, can be the index of the peptide as well.
Returns:
precursor charge, null should be returned if not available

getPeptidePrecursorMz

double getPeptidePrecursorMz(java.lang.Comparable proteinId,
                             java.lang.Comparable peptideId)
Get precursor m/z on peptide level Note: sometimes, precursor m/z at the peptide level is different from the precursor charge at the spectrum level As the peptide-level precursor charge is often assigned by search engine rather than ms instrument

Parameters:
proteinId - identification id
peptideId - peptid eid, can be the index of the peptide as well.
Returns:
precursor charge, null should be returned if not available

getPeptideTheoreticalMz

double getPeptideTheoreticalMz(java.lang.Comparable proteinId,
                               java.lang.Comparable peptideId)
Get The Peptide Theoretical Mz from the file Note: sometimes, precursor m/z at the peptide level is different from the precursor charge at the spectrum level As the peptide-level precursor charge is often assigned by search engine rather than ms instrument

Parameters:
proteinId - identification id
peptideId - peptid eid, can be the index of the peptide as well.
Returns:
precursor charge, null should be returned if not available
